entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Delta
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Blowing snow in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h increasing to 50 gusting to 70 in the evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023
